item.title: Is there talk of a merger at your hospital?
item.description: Hospitals are merging across Ontario. The result are run-off votes between unions in those hospitals where members choose which union will represent them.

item.title: CUPE's Detailed Guide to PSLRTA
item.description: When workplaces covered by PSLRTA amalgamate, merge or restructure, the Ontario Labour Relations Board (OLRB) will, in consultation with the affected unions and employers, determine what bargaining units are appropriate in the new workplace.
